author: skews13
title: Good News Ohio Ladies Your GOP Senator Has Decided Your Legitimate Healthcare
text: Posts: 4,715 Good News Ohio Ladies Your GOP Senator Has Decided Your Legitimate Healthcare We're just not going to have to worry our pretty heads about our health care now, because Sen. Rob Portman (OH-R. Of course.) is in charge of deciding what care we can get, you know, "legitimately." Yeah, he looks like an expert... Did he get appointed to the Independent Payment Advisory Board? Location: Canuckistan Posts: 15,147 Are the "lady parts" those that cause legitimate rape or the illegitimate rape? I could never figure that one out. That dumbass republican, Todd Akin never really explained it very well. Thanks from Camelot and LongWinded Quote: Originally Posted by skews13 We're just not going to have to worry our pretty heads about our health care now, because Sen. Rob Portman (OH-R. Of course.) is in charge of deciding what care we can get, you know, "legitimately." Well, now, in all fairness, republicans don't consider women, black and immigrants to be 100% human.
